Friends&Foes is a mod focused on adding all eliminated mobs from the minecraft mob votes and also the forgotten mobs like the Illusioner with a rich lore.

As cool looking as the glow squid is, it does not really bring anything new to the game. Thus one of the main goals is to also further expand upon original concepts and add new vanilla like features related to all of the mobs.

You can check wiki for a detailed overview of implemented features.

Looking for the Fabric or Quilt version?

 

  
Unaffected and exposed copper golems    Glare flying in the lush caves
 
  
Bee pollinating moobloom's flowers    Beekeeper with a new village structure
 
  
Iceologer summoning ice chunk    Iceologer Cabin structure in the snowy taiga biome
 
  
Illusioner shooting villager with his bow    Illusioner Shack structure in the taiga biome
 
  
One beehive for each wood variant    All four stages of the copper button
 
    
One of four variants of copper golem workstation structures     
 

 

 

 

 

 

The main goal is to add all of the mobs listed below. I already got pretty solid ideas for most of the mobs and features but you are more than welcome to share your ideas or give some feedback.

 

I am currently working on the Wildfire.

 

Friends

  • Copper Golem
  • Glare
  • Moobloom

 

Foes

  • Iceologer
  • Illusioner
  • Barnacle
  • Mauler (Great Hunger)Mauler
  • Wildfire

 

Block/Items

  • Beehives
  • Buttercup
  • Copper Button

 

Structures

  • Beekeeper Area
  • Copper Golem Workstation
  • Iceologer Cabin
  • Illusioner Shack

 

Village/Villagers

  • Beekeeper

 

 

 

 

I will continue to develop my mods regardless of any support as it is my hobby. If you want to support me anyway you can do that on Patreon or Ko-fi.

 

 

 

 

 

The mod is licensed with CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 license.

Feel free to look over my code for examples of how i have implemented and solved various problems while writing this mod, incorporate snippets into your own code. Also feel free to use this mod in any modpack (although credit/link back to this page will be greatly appreciated).

You can also look into the blockbench directory which contains all of the models & palettes and into the textures directory for textures. Get inspired, but please don't just copy & paste any of it as your own.
